response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value and can significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I propose a special introductory price of $7,500 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and is designed to help you maximize the benefits of our product while ensuring you receive the best possible value. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 7500}
